title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message:
I have this 00165 that won’t detect WiFi card.

After a PRAM reset it detects and works for around 30 minutes and then goes back to not detecting. I can then make another PRAM reset and it works again for another 30 minutes and the story continues over and over.

I already tried another known good WiFi card...

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message: Inspect for corrosion around U3540 and the SMC itself.

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message: No liquid. According to the customer WiFi just stopped working one day. No corrosion to be found after inspection. It has been to another repair shop who offered a logic board replacement. Only thing I noticed when taking apart was that the WiFi card was a little bit looser than normal when taking it out of socket connector. Probably because the other repair shop had taking the card in and out a thousand of times. I replaced the connector but problem is the same.

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message: U3550 looking all clean?  I've had corrosion appear there on seemingly perfect boards.

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message: Looked clean yesterday when inspecting from the top. I’ll have a closer look at it from the side later today.

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message: No corrosion at U3550. Also PP3V3_WLAN is ok at 3.3V all the time both when the machine detects but also when not detecting the WiFI card.

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message:
Check AP_RESET_CONN_L, AP_CLKREQ_L and SMC_WIFI_PWR_EN.
Also check CLK100M presence at J3501.

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message:
AP_RESET_CONN_L = 0 (3.3 when working)
P_CLKREQ_L = 0 (3.0 when working)
SMC_WIFI_PWR_EN = 3.4

CLK100M not present

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message:
"P_CLKREQ_L = 0 (3.0 when working)"
Are you sure???
AP_CLKREQ_L should be low.
We don't want active reset, but we want active clok request; both have _L at the end.
Check if AP_CLKREQ_Q_L is low; must be tied to ground on airport card.
Consider changing U3540.

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message: I will double check it and get back

title: 820-00165 - No WiFi hardware installed
message:
Thanks for the effort. Customer got another board. I still have this board here and I will post again if I ever get back to it.... 

Thanks again
